content: elizabeth smith k n i t s simply stripes baby/lap blanket pattern info finished size techniques approx 27 /68 5 cm x 27 /68 5 cm long tail cast on i like using the thumb method of this cast-on - check out this great video tutorial gauge 14 sts & 32 row = 4 /10 cm in garter st from purl soho http //bit ly/2a2pdcb changing colors check out this video from vic- yarn ki howell http //bit ly/2qn83q8 approx 100 yds of bulky-weight yarn for each of 6 colors so a total of 600 yds shown in vintage weaving in ends i like to use the duplicate stitch chunky by berroco 50% acrylic 40% wool 100g = technique when weaving in my ends - check 130 yds using the following colors out this tutorial from purl soho scroll down to weaving in ends with duplicate stitch section color a = bilberry 61104 http //bit ly/2tspjg0 color b = sunny 6121 color c = breezeway 6194 color d = tang 6164 abbreviations color e = clary 61103 approx = approximately bobble = bind-off color f = dewberry 6167 circ = circular needle co = cast on k = knit st s = stitch es needles & other supplies us 10 5/6 5 mm 32 /80 cm circ needle or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle to weave in ends stitch pattern garter stitch knit every row contact information find me at elizabethsmithknits com email info@elizabethsmithknits com images and pattern © 2012 2019 elizabeth smith knits / the brown stitch llc all rights reserved www elizabethsmithknits com 1 instructions section 1 section 4 with color a and using the long tail cast-on working just with color d now work in garter st method co 94 sts knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 work in garter st knitting every row for 26 row garter st ridges since switching just to color d - you will have 13 garter st ridges join color e and k 2 row join color b and k 2 row switch back to color d and k 2 row switch back to color a and k 2 row with color e k 2 row with color b k 2 row with color d k 2 row with color a k 2 row with color e k 2 row with color b k 2 row with color d k 2 row cut color d making sure with color a k 2 row cut color a making sure to leave a long tail to weave in later to leave a long tail to weave in later section 5 section 2 working just with color e now work in garter st knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 working just with color b now work in garter st garter st ridges since switching just to color e knitting every row for 26 row - you will have 13 join color f
